pages.text: This augment can be added to any module which has a range (Sender $(l:modules/sender_1)Mk1/$ / $(l:modules/sender_2)Mk2/$, Puller $(l:modules/puller_1)Mk1/$ / $(l:modules/puller_2)Mk2/$, Extruder $(l:modules/extruder_1)Mk1/$ / $(l:modules/extruder_2)Mk2/$, $(l:modules/fluid_2)Fluid Mk2/$, $(l:modules/vacuum)Vacuum/$).$(p)It can be stacked; each augment will increase the range of the module by one block.
